home.promo: Group of parents of children and youth with developmental disabilities, guided by a common goal and mission to improve the quality of life of their children!
home.mainGoals1: Improvement and development of the system of social, educational and health care for persons with disabilities
home.mainGoals2: Encouraging and including children and youth with disabilities in all segments of social and economic life, especially in the field of education and employment
home.mainGoals3: Persistent commitment against all forms of discrimination, especially discrimination against children and youth with disabilities

activities.title: Our activities
activities.text1: Work on informing the general public about all problems related to the development of children, youth and persons with disabilities
activities.text2: Registration of children, youth and persons with disabilities
activities.text3: Providing assistance to children, youth and persons with development disabilities and their families
